metadata.Title: SnowDepthTrans
metadata.Extended description: STICS component computing snow cover depth in centimeters by multiplying the snow depth Sdepth (m) by a conversion/density factor Pns (cm per m). Implemented in Fortran90 as subroutine model_snowdepthtrans; intended time step is 1.
metadata.Short description: Converts snow depth from meters to centimeters using Pns.
